plot: When her 17-year old grandson accidentally kills his best friend, his eccentric backwoods grandmother flees with him and his older sister across the American West into a both comedic and dramatic collision with the mainstream world.   Written by  Anonymous
title: Adventures of the Dunderheads
plot_es: When her 17-year old grandson accidentally kills his best friend, his eccentric backwoods grandmother flees with him and his older sister across the American West into a both comedic and dramatic collision with the mainstream world.   Written by  Anonymous
plot_en: When her 17-year old grandson accidentally kills his best friend, his eccentric backwoods grandmother flees with him and his older sister across the American West into a both comedic and dramatic collision with the mainstream world.   Written by  Anonymous
